commit message: Sharing a url to pindroid where that url already has a bookmark opens it for editing instead.
Fixed bug with bookmark live folders.
Browse Tags activity is now implemented as a fragment.
Bookmarks in bookmark sync are now retrieved in pages, should result in lower memory footprint.
Added text to login screen to point users towards Pinboard's website if they don't have an account.
Fixed fc bug on browse bookmark screen rotation while an rss feed was loading.
